column4: when i try to boot off the ubuntu cd it goes to a black screen with syslinux at the top?????
can someone help me fix my ubuntu install ?
my install,grub is gone. syslinux is coming up. i cant even boot off the cd .
i installed windows7 and now i cant boot into ubuntu
and the cd wont boot either
cd wont boot?
maybe your bios settings are stopping the disc from booting
which part?
sure ask your questions and we will help
that is normal (not good but normal)
what is your status on the grub thing?
no you can do it without rebooting
are you in a live cd?
go to /boot/grub
if you find a file 'menu.lst' then you have grub legacy. if you find grub.cfg then grub2
you can still install grub 2 over that
which docs are you using?
can you give me a link? maybe i can help you
ok ill check it out
ok can you tell me how your computer is partitioned?
installation is the same :)
maverick
use synaptic
